title: amgr Configuration
description: Configuration schema for amgr - AI agent configuration manager. Sources are required for sync operations.

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for IDE validation

sources.description: Rules sources (git URLs or local paths). Required for sync operations. Sources are applied in order - later sources override earlier ones.

oneOf.description: Git URL or local path (type auto-detected)

name.description: Optional display name for the source

path.description: Local file system path (supports ~ for home directory)

name.description: Optional display name for the source

targets.description: AI tools to generate configurations for

features.description: Content types to include in the generated configuration

use-cases.description: Use-case identifiers from configured sources. Required for sync operations.

simulateCommands.description: Generate simulated commands for tools without native support

simulateSubagents.description: Generate simulated subagents for tools without native support

simulateSkills.description: Generate simulated skills for tools without native support

modularMcp.description: Enable modular-mcp for Claude Code (reduces token usage)

ignoreGlobalSources.description: Ignore global sources for this project (use only project-specific sources)

globalSourcesPosition.description: Where to insert global sources relative to project sources. 'prepend' (default): global first, project overrides. 'append': project first, global overrides.
